channel.title: Fulbertus on Eschenbach's De Poetis Christianis Sacris
channel.description: Recent content in Fulbertus on Eschenbach's De Poetis Christianis Sacris

item.title: XL.
item.description: Iisdem temporibus Fulbertus Carnotensis, Ecclesiae Carnotensis Cancellarius et Episcopus, Varia Metra scripsisse fertur, de B. Virgine; de Sacra Cruce; de Timore, Spe et Amore; deque Se ipso. Obiit An. 1029.
